Insert code block: A label of the button that allows inserting a new code block into the editor content.
Plain text: A language of the code block in the editor content when no specific programming language is associated with it.
Leaving %0 code snippet: Assistive technologies label for entering the code block with specified language in document.
Entering %0 code snippet: Assistive technologies label for leaving the code block with specified language in document.
Entering code snippet: Assistive technologies label for entering the code block with not specified language in document.
Leaving code snippet: Assistive technologies label for leaving the code block with not specified language in document.
